title: Azir Nerfs
body: What do you high Elo Azir's mains think Azir's newest q Nerfs will affect him?

replies.body: One could make the assumption that Riot buffed him last patch, the slow change is undoubtedly a nerf to his lane bullying but it won't affect him too much if you intend to buy Rylais as a core item, which i'm fine with.
